title: Pushing up Daisies
short_desc: The crew, after a short time at the pool, find their very lives threatened by Dread once more.

content.text: t!8ball Does Emmett wake up from his new room on the new ship?
ðŸŽ± | Concentrate and ask again, Zander.
t!8ball Does Emmett wake up from his new room on the new ship?
ðŸŽ± | It is decidedly so, Zander.
Ah! Good morning.
Emmett peers around the hallway.
Sanya leans in the hall and gives Emmett a slight wave.
Hello, Emmett.
t!8ball Does Hector wake up in his new room?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, MultiTheDuck.
Emmett is taken aback by Sanya's appearance and shakes his head quickly.
You scared me, Sanya.
Not my fault.
Get any sleep?
Sanya stretches.
Wassn't tired.
t!8ball Does Sanya go and wake up the rest of the crew?
ðŸŽ± | It is certain, Brakia.
Sanya turns to her room to wake up Iris.
I'll go wake everyone up.
Matieu swings into the hall in a daze.
Ugh... plantwoman....
t!8ball Does the half asleep Matieu lick one of Sanya's flowers?
ðŸŽ± | Cannot predict now, Enchantingtable2013.
Seth speaks into his comms watch from his room, sounding a bit frustrated.
Where is my hologram projector?
Emmett sighs and replies to Seth.
We didn't install it yet.
Morning, Bird. Morning Sseth.
Shit...
Emmett gives a slight smile to his crewmates filling up the hall.
Hey everyone.
Want some breakfast?
Do you have ssteak?
t!8ball Does Seth get up from bed and go make him a bowl of breakfast salad?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, Bagelwrecker.
Seth sits at counter, picking at his salad with a fork.
I wish we had stopped by to have dinner with my family.
Emmett inhales with a piqued expression.
Your parents are weird.
Yeah, but that's just how noble and religious elven families are.
Seth gives Emmett an affectionate head scratch.
My mother seems to enjoy your company a little too much though.
I'm here now, still learning this ship, did I miss anything?
Nothing much, we're just having breakfast.
That's good...
Hector sits at the table opposing Seth and Emmett.
She overfed me that one time. Quite strange.
t!8ball Does Emmett take out some raw meat from the fridge?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, Zander.
Tsk. Just like your grandmother did when I escorted you to her home.
Sanya takes in the wonderful aroma of blood and tissue.
Ooh. what meat iss that?
Hector eyeballs the meat and pinches his nose, the stench quite pungent.
Not any form of pork, that's for sure.
Emmett mutters darkly. Looking at the meat in disgust.
Llama.
What did you say? I couldn't hear you?
I dont care what it iss.
Your grandmother made a great salad though, guess that's the result of that giant farming operation she owned.
Seth pops a berry in his mouth.
Emmett gulps and speaks louder, regretting his past decision to procure said meat.
Llamanian.
Seth raises an eyebrow, realizing what Emmett was saying.
Emmett, you okay?
Oh my, where did you get that from?
Emmett stares at the meat cube.
Know how I was acting strange the other day?
Yeah...?
Yes, why is that?
I put down a soldier that day and felt guilty...
Emmett shivers and starts digging in the cabinets.
t!8ball Does Hector look through the cabinets for something other than llama to eat?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, definitely, MultiTheDuck.
So you cut them up and put them in the fridge?
Hector gulps, having nearly puked.
Seth sighs and rolls his eyes, believing Emmett was overreacting.
Welp, whatever.
Who cares?
I didn't chop them up. I took them to a butcher...
Emmett looks around at the others, doubting himself.
I dunno'. I feel bad for it...
t!8ball Does Sanya eat the llama meat?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, Brakia.
Didn't want to let him go to waste...
Hector inhales deeply and tries to be reassuring despite his disgust.
Thats a good idea, like the Native Martians and the Larates...
I've never tried Llama.
Might as well, right my little murderer?
Emmett scowls at Seth, flaring his canines.
It's not bad, really depends where it is from and how it is cooked...
Emmett takes out a skillet and tosses the cut meat upon it.
That's a good start, never broil llama.
Here goes nothing, I guess.
t!8ball Does Seth put his bowl away?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, definitely, Bagelwrecker.
t!8ball Does Emmett cook the meat well-done?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, Zander.
Sanya taps her feet from the wondrous aroma of the cooking meat.
Sso, what are we doing today?
Seth scoffs out of disgust.
Yum...
Emmett takes out a spatula and crushes the meat.
Honestly, probably skinny dipping. Jackshit.
Supply run maybe?
Emmett shrugs.
I dunno'.
t!8ball Does Sanya's god appear to her and give her a quest?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, MultiTheDuck.
Sanya rolls her eyes at Emmett's immature gesture.
I heard about thiss group of wandering knightss that were around thiss ssysstem.
Seth bangs his fist against the table.
Lets kill them!
My thoughtss exactly.
Emmett grimaces.
Morbid.
No.
Or we could go a day without killing someone?
Emmett we need to go to a space station!
Emmett groans and turns off the stove. The smell of the cooked llamanian meat was less pungent than before, but still unappealing.
t!8ball Do the knights start to attack the ship?
ðŸŽ± | It is certain, Brakia.
What was that?!!
t!8ball Do they go away?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, definitely, Bagelwrecker.
Emmett immediately grabs onto the stove from the sudden rustling of the ship from the ambush.
It's a hit and run!
Follow them!
Should we chase them?
Seth stands up and groans loudly.
No!
t!8ball Does the crew start chasing them?
ðŸŽ± | It is decidedly so, Zander.
I'll be back in a second, I'm going to get my rifle!
t!8ball Does Hector find a few knights trying to raid the ship on the way to his room?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, MultiTheDuck.
t!8ball Does the crew catch up and board the knight's ship?
ðŸŽ± | It is decidedly so, Brakia.
t!8ball Did every weapon in the system the crew's in get turned into dildos?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook good, Bagelwrecker.
Hector picks up his rifle before it appears to transform into a latex sex toy.
God dammit, what happened to my rifle?!
Seth takes out his desert eagle and realizes that the barrel appears to be quite floppy and rubbery.
Cool!
I can't wait to beat a few heads in with Sanya's used dildos!
Emmett raises an eyebrow as his crossbow's ammunition appears to be replaced with explosive dildos.
Iris wakes up suddenly.
t!8ball Do the weapons exchange into their normal forms with the ability to turn into dildos when wanted?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, Zander.
Wh-?!
Iris looks around frantically for her dagger.
Where's my mom's dagger...?
Iris stands, whipping around to scan the room.
t!8ball Do the knights start attacking the crew with grass dildos?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, MultiTheDuck.
Iris spots the dagger on the nightstand, breathing a sigh of relief and snatching it up.
Good.
t!8ball Does Sanya's flesh sword return to its original form?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, Brakia.
I have no clue what I'd do if I lost it.
Iris gives a sly smile.
Wait, my ssword changed.
Sanya rotates the sword haphazardly, looking about the hilt.
Oh yeah, I forgot.
Iris hums, putting her dagger back in its sheath.
What to do, what to do...
My ssword wassn't alwayss made of flesh...
An idea strikes Iris, and she smiles lightly, humming a tune as she makes her way to the kitchen.
Sanya rubs her fingertips on the sharp end of her blade, muttering to herself.
The maker of thiss sword curssed it so that when he killed himsself with it, the blade would transsform into a ssword made of hiss flessh.
t!8ball Does Iris make an obscene amount of muffins?
ðŸŽ± | You may rely on it, Jelsafan0.
Sso he could "live on" or ssomething.
Emmett, who was aiming at the knights with his crossbow, gives the two lollygaggers a perturbed look.
JUST GET ON THE WITH THE KILLING! SQUOAT DAMNIT!
I never questioned it...
Sanya hisses, sheathes her blade, and leaves her room to join in on the carnage.
Iris, meanwhile, begins to bake, and the unmistakable scent of blueberry muffins filters into the air.
t!8ball Does the lead knight take out his massive dildo-shaped club?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, Zander.
t!roll d25
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d25... Rolled a 5, WatchfulDrake.
Using his spare blasters, Hector shoots at the knights without much caution. His shoddy aim results in mostly missed shots more than anything.
t!roll d30
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d30... Rolled a 19, Brakia.
Sanya rushes into the enemy ship and takes out her blade, slicing one of the knight's heads clean off.
t!roll d15
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d15... Rolled a 3, Zander.
The lead knight attempts to slap Sanya with his massive dildo-shaped club, however he manages to miss with it, and he ends up swinging himself to the floor.
Iris hums a lullaby her father taught her as she bakes.

Emmett is about to shoot his crossbow before he realizes that his weapon would probably cause more collateral damage than anything. He decides to put up his weapon and leave the others, joining Iris in the kitchen.
t!8ball Has Iris already baked 4 dozen muffins?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, definitely, Jelsafan0.
t!8ball Does Emmett have his translator set to "charismatic" due to it glitching out from a stray blast?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, Zander.
Four dozen freshly-baked muffins sit on the counter as she places another dozen into the oven.
Emmett sits down at the kitchen table and gives Iris a soft smile.
Hey, good-looking. Watcha' making?
t!roll d25
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d25... Rolled a 9, WatchfulDrake.
Hector reloads his weapons and tries to hit at the knights once more. He's able to tag a few of them, however his shots aren't that effective due to the armor the knights are wearing.
t!roll d30
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d30... Rolled a 29, Brakia.
Sanya takes the Dreadsword and focuses her attention to the fallen lead knight. She manages to critically wound him, having slashed down the length of his exposed back.
The lead knight howls in pain as the sword trails along his spine.
t!roll d15
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d15... Rolled a 5, Zander.
The lead knight tries to get up to get back at Sanya, however his pain causes him to revulse to the ground. As he falls back down, he swipes at Sanya's legs, causing her to trip and fall over.
Nobody has called Iris good looking in a very, very long time. Iris's cheeks turn ever slightly pink, but she ignores it, smiling lightly.
Muffins. Though, I think I should make cake or croissants next...
...I may have made too many.
Iris is a tad flustered, considering she has made an obscene amount of muffins already.
Oh, that's okay. The more you make, the more we can enjoy your baking talent.
Emmett pulls at his collar and gives Iris a pained smile.
As if on cue, the oven beeps and Iris pulls out the batch of muffins, placing them on top of it. She's still a tad flustered.
You think so? They... always turn out blueberry. I thought that was a bit weird.
Iris gets to work on some baguettes.
t!8ball Does Iris somehow make four baguettes at once?
ðŸŽ± | It is certain, Jelsafan0.
Iris places them casually into the oven, turning it on, before starting on croissants.
t!8ball Does Emmett get shocked by his translator?
ðŸŽ± | You may rely on it, Zander.
t!roll 25
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d25... Rolled a 9, WatchfulDrake.

Hector takes a deep breath and once he's able to shoot at the lead knight, he does so. However, as mentioned before, the knights' armor appears to absorb most of his shots, dealing low, yet noticeable damage to the exposed lead knight.
Emmett slaps his collar around and it emits out a static buzz before he speaks.
Hey Iris. Want to go out by the pool later?
t!roll d30
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d30... Rolled a 16, Brakia.
Iris gives him a strange look, not understanding his predicament with the translator.
... The pool? I'm... not sure I have a swimsuit.
t!roll d50
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d50... Rolled a 3, Zander.

The lead knight, as a last resort, grabs the rug near him. It transforms into an absurdly large dildo bat. Unfortunately, as he's stuck to the ground, he's unable to make the most out of his weapon. He tries to slap the life out of Sanya, however he only is able to slam the sex toy on the ground.
He's got to be weak...
That sseemss like it wass ssupossed to be more powerful...
Sanya kicks away the bat from the lead knight and pins him down with the hilt of her blade.
I am dying...
Agreed, let's not let him do that again...
Hector eyeballs the knight with disgust and keeps his blasters aimed at him.
Good.
Sanya shifts the hilt around the knight's back to inflict as much pain as possible to him.
Why did you attack our ship?
t!8ball Does Iris have a swimsuit?
ðŸŽ± | It is certain, Jelsafan0.
... Or... maybe I do?
The oven beeps and Iris pulls out three blueberry baguettes.
t!8ball Does the knight consume a tonic, increasing his strength and his health?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook good, Zander.
... There... wasn't supposed to be this many?
Iris shrugs the kitchen magic off, putting the baguettes to the side and putting in her blueberry croissants.
That's not good!
Emmett pulls on his collar and it snaps back onto his neck like a high-tension rubber band.
I mean, swimsuits are uncomfortable, if you get what I mean.
The collar shocks him once more, causing Emmett to let out a small whimper.
t!roll d25
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d25... Rolled a 11, WatchfulDrake.
Hector continues to blast into the rejuvenated knight, managing to land a shot in his back.
t!roll d30
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d30... Rolled a 1, Brakia.

Sanya charges up a powerful swing, enough to turn her whole body around with the rotational force. Unfortunately, she completely misses the knight with her blade, and is close to slicing herself with it!
Iris hums, completely missing the fact that Emmett's unintentionally coming onto her.
I disagree. When I went swimming in the waterfall in the woods near our home, I always thought the swimsuit felt a lot like a second skin.
t!roll d10
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d10... Rolled a 1, Brakia.
t!roll d10
Thankfully, Sanya misses herself with the swing and manages to swing around once more, aiming her sword at the knight!
t!roll d30
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d30... Rolled a 18, Brakia.
Sanya continues the arc of her swing and slams the blade into the lead knight's side! She kicks the knight, dislodging her sword and pants.
Why wont you die!?
DEATH SLAP OF DEATHLY DEATH!
The lead knight takes off his glove and prepares to slap his two assailants.
Sanya is taken aback by the knight's stupid statement.
What?
Hector backs up from the knight and holds his hands out to try and lower the battle tension.
You don't have to die, you and your crew can surrender!
t!choose Hector | Sanya | Hector | Sanya | Both | Himself | Neither
ðŸ¤” | Zander, I pick Both!
t!roll d60
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d60... Rolled a 20, Zander.

The lead knight slaps both Sanya and Hector with such a velocity that it endangers both of their very lives, having activated a hidden rocket within his armor to propel him. He spits out some blood and spurts out more nonsense.
I GO BYE BYE!
Sanya recoils from the slap and instinctively holds a hand to her face.
Sshit, that wass powerful!
The oven beeps, and Iris pulls out her batch of two dozen croissants, placing it to the side, and putting in a batch of the same size.
t!8ball Are there somehow 50 muffins sitting on the counter now?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, Jelsafan0.
Emmett desperately tries to take his collar off to no avail.
What's the point of a second skin when-
Emmett's collar shocks him violently once more.
You already have one?
Sanya audibly scoffs over Emmett's statement over the comms.
Emmett, sstop flirting.
Iris gives Emmett a slightly disturbed look.
Modesty was a very prominent value on my home planet.
The knight takes a step back and takes a sword to his neck.
Knight stop! you have a good setup here, you don't have to give it all up! Surrender now!
Hector drops his blaster as a means of passing the olive branch.
Emmett tries to take his translator off, but it's affixed to the point that he manages to take his shirt off instead.
t!8ball Does Matieu devour half of the muffins and then proceed to also flirt with Iris?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Enchantingtable2013.
Through stuffed cheeks, Matieu beckons to Iris, having swiped half of the muffins while she was staring at Emmett's fluffy chest.
Aye' babycakes, those muffins were good A.F.!
Iris turns red and turns away quickly in embarrassment.
A-Ah, th-thank you???
P-please put your shirt back on!
Matieu looks down at his shirt, confused at her request.
What? I'm fine.
Emmett attempts to snap off his collar, struggling with it. The frequency of its shocks increases, causing Emmett to howl in pain.
THIS HURTS LIKE SHI-
Emmett gulps and tries to compose himself.
Iris, don't turn around.
Hector smacks his face in embarrassment, hearing Matieu over the comms.
Oh great Matieu is sleep-flirting... You know one time he did that to the ship's fridge...
Matieu attempts to put an arm around Iris and stumbles forward, giving Iris a devious smirk.
It's not like I have bird nipples, but if I show you my chest, you show me yours....
Matieu clicks his tongue.
Iris turns redder, baking at a much quicker and more furious pace to keep the two firtacious idiots out of her mind.
P-please don't!
Matieu leans on the wall, not understanding Iris's embarrassment.
What?
t!8ball Is there a tiny wizard on top of the fridge who causes Emmett's translator to glitch?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, Zander.
More and more baked goods are being pulled out of the oven at an impressive speed.
t!8ball Does the knight surrender his ship, crew, supplies and service to the Vortox Pummelers?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, MultiTheDuck.
Sanya sighs, slightly disappointed over the non-violent outcome, but also relieved.
That wass sslightly eassier than expected...
I'm glad you came to reason, knight.
My name is Todd.
Iris, in a panic, finally questions the weird kitchen magic going on, and freaks out a bit, unsure why Emmett and Matieu are hitting on her simultaneously.
I don't understand what's happening-
That'ss nice...
Okay Todd, you and your crew can continue your mission, but if we ever need you we will call on you and your crew...
Hector pats Todd on the back, causing him to yelp and jump a bit from his wounded back.
t!8ball Does Sanya look through the new stach of weapons for a new side weapon?
ðŸŽ± | Very doubtful, Brakia.
t!8ball Is there an incredible amount of blueberry baked goods on the counter right now?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, Jelsafan0.
Emmett is fumbling with his translator fiercely, ignoring the kitchen phenomenon occurring.
The mountain of blueberry baked goods in the kitchen has reached insane heights; it spans to the ceiling now.
t!8ball Does Todd accidentally press the airlock button when he's resting?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, definitely, Zander.
Todd manages to eject himself out the airlock, having been resting against the airlock door from their encounter.
Sanya rolls her eyes and leaves the ship, having had her fill of excitement from the cretin knights. She enters the kitchen, surprised from the sheer amount of confectionary goods.
Iriss, why iss the kitchen filled with muffinss?!
Todd!
Hector gives a disappointed tongue click and looks to the ground, shaking his head.
Now I have to choose a new leader for them...
I don't understand what's going on, Sanya, can you please explain to my why this is happening?!
Hector points to a random knight that happened to be unharmed from the crew's ambush.
You there, you seem familiar, what is your name?
Sanya shakes her arms in a frenzy.
Why would I know!?
Iris's baking has not slowed. She is absolutely frantic.
My name is Edwin, knight from Camelot, I am searching with this crew for my horse!
It is clear that Edwin is either delusional or from the wrong time period.
IRISS SSTOP!!
Sanya grabs at Iris's shoulders to try and pry her away from the oven.
Emmett whines like a puppy profusely, still fixated on removing his translator.
The mountain of goods now spills out into the hall. Iris groans painfully.
Okay nice, you have fun with that, you're now the leader of this crew, go find your horse, but you are still under our command!
Hector waves off the knights and heads back to the Panty Slingshot.
SSTOP!!
Sanya grips into Iris's shoulders, causing her to bleed a bit.
Iris huffs and continues baking, not giving Sanya nor her bleeding shoulders any notice.
Please make him put his shirt back on-
t!8ball Does Hector spot a small plasma pistol on his way out of the ship?
ðŸŽ± | Most likely, MultiTheDuck.
Iris's mind is conflicted from Emmett's apparent lack of modesty, and said confliction causes her to continue to bake to get his semi-nude body out of her mind.
My heart can't take much more of this-
Hector swipes the plasma pistol and leaves the knights' ship.
I'll be taking that from you, Have fun now!
Iriss, pleasse sstop!
Matieu, completely unfazed by Iris's emotions, pats his stomach gluttonously and gives a beaky smile.
Please, make more muffins!
Hector walks in the kitchen, playing with the plasma pistol.
Matieu giggles.
I mean they're not as finely made as you, but please make more muffins.
Hector is taken aback from the confectionary goods filling the entire kitchen and drops his plasma pistol in bewilderment.
Dear god, why are there so many muffins?!
Iris continues to bake, shaking her head.
Emmett sobs as his collar continues to shock him.
I mean I'm a man of morals.
Matieu winks in Iris's direction despite that she isn't paying attention to him.
t!8ball Does Sanya take Iris out of the kitchen?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Brakia.
Come here!
Sanya is finally able to drag Iris away from the kitchen and takes her into their shared room.
Iris has streams of confused tears going down her face.
I'm not used to being complimented. I'm not okay-
Matieu's head pivots, following Iris as she's taken out the kitchen.
And baking is a very attractive trait.
Let'ss calm you down...
Sanya sits Iris on her bed.
Hector eyeballs the shirtless squoatling who is still having trouble with his collar.
And why is Emmett being shocked by his translator?
Iris wipes her eyes, shaking a bit.
Sanya groans loudly and peeks into the hallway, screaming.
Alsso, Matieu!
WAKE UP!
Emmett finally declares defeat over his collar. He slumps in his chair gloomily and kicks some muffins aside.
Hector takes to Emmett's side, noticing his defeated look.
Emmett what happened while I was gone? Are you okay?
Sanya shuts their door and sits next to Iris on the bed.
Are you alright, Iriss?
t!8ball Does Matieu wake up?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, Enchantingtable2013.
Matieu shakes awake, completely unaware of his inappropriate behavior prior.
OH SHIT.
Emmett looks up at Hector in a way that indicates shit happened, his mouth quivering.
Sanya exhales and mutters into her comms watch.
Morning, prince charmer.
Hector, what did I say?!
Hector smirks.
It makes what you said to the fridge look like a Quarterfette card.
Iris sniffles.
I haven't had a romantic interaction with a boy... ever...
Sanya looks away from Iris, unsure how to respond.
Oh. I'm not really the one to talk to about that...
Sanya puts her hand on her neck, uncomfortable.
I'm not okayyyyyyyyy...
Iris leans her face on Sanya's shoulder, balling her eyes out.
Emmett sticks his tongue out, getting shocked in the process.
MY TRANSLAT-
Emmett convulses from the painful shocks.
Okay lets take that off for now...
Hector reaches out to Emmett's collar but takes his hand back when Emmett is shocked once more.
We don't need you to get zapped anymore...
Apathetically, Sanya stands up, causing Iris to fall onto the bed.
I have to check on Emmett. Jusst sstay calm, alright?
Iris remains quiet and shivers on the bed.
t!8ball Does Iris remember how the other children always avoided her because she was half-archidemon?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, Jelsafan0.
t!8ball Does Emmett try to pull the translator off, despite the additional harm it could cause him?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, Zander.
PLIERS-
Where are they, can you point to where they are?
Emmett shakily points in the general direction of the cockpit.
I'll be right back.
Hector gets up and leaves for the cockput. He's a good man.
Iris's memory is pushed to her one and only crush, who avoided her because she was a hybrid. Because she was... different.
Before Sanya leaves the room, she looks back at the pitiful mess that is Iris.
Hey Iriss, are you alright?
Iris nods silently, sniffling.
Fine.
Okay, will these work?
Hector holds up the pliers he found.
Alright. If you're ssure...
Sanya leaves the room and heads back into the kitchen.
Emmett nods.
t!roll d10
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d10... Rolled a 1, Zander.
Thankfully, removing the collar did little to harm Emmett any more.
Did that help?
Emmett stretches and rubs his neck. He gives out a bleat of acceptance.
Oh no...
Sanya enters the kitchen, seeing a frazzled and sweating squoatling being attended to by Hector.
That's good...
Emmett grabs the collar and starts to rearrange some wires, hoping he could fix the translator. Buying a new one would be quite a pain.
t!8ball does Hector start working on his flying drone?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, MultiTheDuck.
t!8ball Does Sanya squat down and check on Emmett?
ðŸŽ± | Very doubtful, Brakia.
Sanya heads over to Emmett and tilts her head out of concern for her best friend. She peeks at his chest, unsure why Iris would be so embarrassed over some flat and hairy flesh.
You alright, Emmett?
Sanya shivers a bit in repugnance over her previous thoughts.
Emmett nods.
Hel, Ya.
Squoatish Translation: "Yeah, Sanya."
Okay...
Sanya raises a leafy eyebrow over Emmett's dialect.
Squo dobre.
Squoatish Translation: "I'm fine."
t!8ball Does Iris set her translator to Squoatish so she can talk to him, grabbing a muffin on the way to sit?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, Jelsafan0.
t!8ball Does Matieu awake flirt with Iris now?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, Enchantingtable2013.

Iris takes a big breath, enters the kitchen, and sits next to Emmett, trying not to look at his bare chest. She changes her translator to Squoatish, wanting to have a conversation with him over what just occurred between them.
Hey.
Emmett looks over to the half-elf and gives her a half-smile. He speaks to her perfectly, considering that she's changed her translator source language.
Hey Iris.
You okay?
t!8ball Does Hector start to handstand?
ðŸŽ± | You may rely on it, Zander.
t!choose crab | head | normal | other
ðŸ¤” | MultiTheDuck, I pick crab!
